FKE Seminar Series – Mr. Peter Macaulay
=======================================

by [shahidatulsadiah](https://fke.utm.my/author/shahidatulsadiah/ "Posts by shahidatulsadiah")
 | Jan 10, 2025 | [Anouncement](https://fke.utm.my/category/anouncement/)
, [FKESeminarSeries](https://fke.utm.my/category/fkeseminarseries/)
, [Postgraduate-info](https://fke.utm.my/category/postgraduate-info/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/MrPeterMacaulay-1-980x551.jpeg)

Assalamualaikum and Salam Sejahtera,

All postgraduate students are cordially invited to attend a seminar which is scheduled as follows:  
Guest Speaker: Mr. Peter Macaulay (Fiber Architect, Enterprise Business, CelcomDigi Berhad)  
Title: The Role of Optical Fiber Technology in Modern Data Centers  
Date: 15 January 2025 / Wednesday  
Time: 11 AM – 12 PM  
Venue: Smart Classroom, Level 4, P19a, FKE

(CPD hour is awarded for staff, postgraduate students’ attendance will be recorded to fulfill the faculty’s requirement)
